english_translation: A person from Banu Sa'd ibn Zaid Manah ibn Tamim, who is the cousin of 'Ati ibn Dumarah al-Sa'di who narrated from Ubay ibn Ka'b, and Muslim ibn Nudhair has narrated from Ali and Hudhayfa, he was a person of few traditions, and they mention that he believed in the return (belief in bodily resurrection).

english_translation: I came to Ali while he was distributing (wealth), so I said: Will you not give me from what you are distributing? He said: Are you not in need of it? I said: Yes. He said: There is no good for you in it.

english_translation: Some people from Ukal came to Ali with a man and a woman. They found them in a blanket, and with them was wine and fragrant herbs. So Ali said: They are both vile and have been made vile. He said: So they flogged them less than the prescribed limit.
